short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Birdtannica is your bird web guide. From Britannica, you can get instant bird identification from photos online. You can alsoâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Birdtannica is your bird web guide. From Britannica, you can get instant bird identification from photos online. You can also practice identifying birds through the "Guess Bird" mode. Feel free to watch the demo above!

Hope you enjoy using Birdtannica!
